def_en: If a man has a wet dream, he has a dream about sex which causes him to have an orgasm while he is asleep.

def_cn: 带来很大乐趣的人(或物);乐子
def_en: If someone says that a person or thing is a particular person's wet dream, they are saying in an unkind and mocking way that this person or thing would give that person a lot of pleasure.
